alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued January 14 at 9:59AM EST until January 15 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing temperatures around 32 possible. * WHERE...Coastal Duval, Coastal St. Johns and Coastal Flagler Counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Appropriate action should be taken to ensure tender vegetation and outdoor pets have adequate protection from the cold temperatures. Young children, the elderly and the homeless are especially vulnerable to the cold. Take measures to protect them.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns
